rating_comment: Prashant is an excellent host, very clear and honest in his communications, and accommodative in general.
We stayed in the property with my family. Prashant is extremely helpful host helped us with all our queries . It was a pleasant stay.

Overall, I can't think of anything to improve on Prashant's place.
Starting with the booking till we checked out, Prashant and his property manager were both very responsive and helpful. The house is in it's own compund with a little garden space. The house itself is very spacious. Both rooms have ACs and both bathrooms have geysers for hot water. The wifi was fast and worked well throughout our stay. They have a power backup that lasts for a couple of hours if the there is a power cut and a smart TV that is ready to use. The kitchen had all the utensils we needed to cook meals during the week, and the area around the house was good for walking our dog.
I'd definitely recommend this place for people looking for a self sustained home in Siliguri.

We were very happy to stay in Prashant's home in Siliguri. The apartment is clean and spacious, it has all the necessary facilities for a convenient stay. The beds are the most comfortable, we had a great rest there. The place is easy to find and Prashant was most helpful in giving us directions on the phone as we were approaching the apartment. There are several restaurants nearby with delicious food and pharmacies open until late if you need one. Also, the apartment is located near the train station and Sikkim National Transportation bus station. So, if you are planning a trip to Sikkim, you only need to walk a couple of minutes to reach the bus or a cab to Sikkim. Thank you, Prashant, for the warmest welcome!

Pros:
1. Location of the property is very good.
2. Availability of the public transport.
3. Rooms are spacious and clean
4. Host was reachable and supportive
5. Amenities were present as per the description.
6. Late checkout was supported by the host.
Cons:
Not much. Kitchen can be little bit more clean.
Mosquitoes are there. However, repellent & window nets were provided.
I'll stay again and refer my friends.
Great hospitality. Host is very responsive. Definitely will recommend this place.
Well worth the stay,Amazing and super helpful everything was excellent.Thank you host for the best stay in Siliguri and.looking forward to many more stays with you all
As always amazing, peaceful place and nearby to everything. shoutout to the amazing host.
Was our second time.. comfortable and familial with good help for our pets also
Quiet, private and peaceful. Great for pets!

if you are looking for a stay where you feel safe and you have pets and need some open space for them, it's a perfect place. However, as per my opinion the house needs a good deep and dust cleaning.
Overall very responsive host and responsive caretaker. If a proper deep cleaning is done, nothing can beat this place. I didn't feel any difficulty staying here and they were always proactive to help me out

What was great:
1) Communication - Prashant reached out quickly after we made the booking, letting us know how to find the place and how to get in. Check-in and check-out were straightforward and fuss-free.
2) Accessibility - The apartment is on the ground floor - perfect for us since we had a lot of luggage. It's also only 500m from Siliguri Junction, where we got off our train. If roads are clear, an auto or Uber takes only 20 minutes from the Airbnb to New Jalpaiguri Station.
3) Food - There are shops nearby, or you can order food from Zomato/Swiggy.
4) Cleanliness - The apartment is neat and clean. Fully furnished with a well-stocked kitchen. The host had kept filled water bottles, both at room temperature as well as chilled.
What could have been better:
1) Insect screens in the bedroom - The living room windows had insect nets, but the bedroom windows did not. We had to keep the windows shut to keep the mosquitoes out.
2) Pricing - For 2 people staying overnight, a bit steep!
Great stay, especially for a big group. Lot's of space and functional kitchen. Thanks for your great communication.

Nice place and very friendly, accomodative host.
I would love to visit back.
thank you Prashant ji
The place is very simple. House does need maintenance.

The place needs to be maintained properly. The pictures dis not match with the present condition of the property. They provided 2 pairs of sleepers against 5 persons. The main door lock needs to be repaired/replaced. The property needs pest control.
A homely stay located in siliguri. Had a pleasant stay.
nice place, very near to snt and siliguri junction. amazing place with peaceful and comfortable ambience.

When I heard that the Siliguri market is close to this place, I thought it'll be a dingy and noisy place - I was proved wrong. It's a quiet and spacious space with clean and functional rooms. It's a great place to stay if you've just descended from the mountains and need to recover before you fly back home. Or if you've just landed in Bagdogra, this is a convenient place to just relax for an evening before taking off to the hills.
The host is probably one of the best I have communicated with. His food options were spot on (which is so important if you're travelling with family), and so were his cab recommendations.
If you want to visit the buzzling and atmospheric Siliguri market, just cross the road and get into a shared auto/toto for Rs. 20. While coming back, you need to tell the toto to drop you to Gurung Basti Modh (after crossing the bridge). The airport too is just around 40 mins away even during peak time.
Overall a great place to stay in Siliguri.
It was a wonderful stay at Prashant's place. Very beautiful and clean. Location is spot on. Would highly recommend it for stays in Siliguri and would love to come back.

Prashant's place felt like home. It had all the amenities mentioned and regular cleaning was done. The location is bang in the middle of the city but no noise gets to you. My stay was quite nice and peaceful and I would definitely recommend it to other people.
Great place to stay with family. Host had provided all the details in advance and was helpful.
Nice host with all amenities provided.
Right place to stay if you are a pet parent. Thanks to Prashant and Mahesh ji.
